NATSPAC.title: NATSPAC
NATSPAC.description: Let's begin with some things people think about today. We are faced with many problems in this country, none of which can be solved easily or inexpensively. For each of the following problems, please indicate whether you think we're spending too much money on it, too little money, or about the right amount. First: The space exploration program ... are we spending too much, too little, or about the right amount on The space exploration program?
